title: News-Letter
description: Developed a personalized news app using React with API integration for news fetching.Enabled users to search news across various categories and save article for later use.

title: Music-Box
description: Musicbox is a modern web application built with React.js that integrates seamlessly with Spotify API to provide interactive music listening experience.

title: Portfolio
description: Welcome to my portfolio website,a platform showcasing my skills, projects, and experience in web development.Designed with focus on clarity and user experience, the site offers an organized view of my technical capabilities and achievements.
